objects.text:
• 2 Adorable Pet Kitties
• Spinning Palm Tree & Hammock
• 9 Interactive Play Pieces

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner is a playful and vibrant advertisement for a toy playset, split into two distinct halves. The left side features a bright pink background with polka dots and contains several text elements layered vertically: a large, bold heading ("heading"), a subheading ("subheading"), a bullet list of features ("description"), a standout price ("price"), and a strong call-to-action button composed of a rectangular colored background ("cta_background") and centered text ("cta"). The right side displays the product image ("product_image") over a soft blue background accented with abstract waves, hinting at a tropical theme. Overall, the layout is kid-friendly and visually engaging.

**Color Palette:**
- Pink: `#FF8AD4` (Background left), `#FF6EB9`, `#FF52AF` (Polka dots)
- Blue: `#F2FBFF` (Background right), `#A5E8FF` (Wave lines)
- Purple: `#8A2BE2` (CTA Button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Typography across all text layers)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and playful color palette appealing to children. Dominant colors include Pink (#F65CA9) used in the top mini-house, evoking fun and femininity; Aqua Green (#4CC9A1) seen on the grass-like platform and palm leaves, adding freshness and vibrancy; and Sandy Beige (#F1C396) on the base and pillars, giving a warm, beach-like appearance. Accents like Lavender (#C89AEA), Sky Blue (#3BC7DD), Red-Pink (#D62454), and Bright Orange-Brown (#C26C32) in characters and accessories enhance contrast and visual interest. The bright colors are harmoniously blended, yet each stands out due to their defined areas, making the set eye-catching and cheerful.
